name: Krampus Round Silver Pendant
description:
Hello, welcome to my Krampus 13 Days of Xmas special promotion.

This is pendant launched at Midnight 6 December to kick off proceedings! There will be sale items and offer codes for the next 13 days to keep your eyes peeled!

Legend has it that Krampus visited naughty children during the Yule season and if they were very bad he'd put them in his sack!! So hope you've been good he he!

Large round silver pendant featuring the figure of Krampus creeping through a snowy enchanted forest. 

Miniature art captured within multiple layers of crystal clear resin. Embellished with Swarovski crystals and a little fairy dust!

Each design is hand painted, thus each finished piece will differ slightly - so you will be getting a true one of a kind!

Your item will sparkle beautifully under light.

Silver plated pendant and chain with extender.

Chain length: 16" (41cm)
Approx size of pendant:  1½" x 1½" (4 x 4cm)

Presented in a magnetic close gift box and includes a polishing cloth.

name: Expedited Upgrade to Special Delivery
description:
If you are in the UK and your order is over £50, it is automatically shipped  via next day Special Delivery.

Orders under £50 are sent by 1st Class Signed For Service, but if you are in a hurry for your item and want it next day guaranteed, it can be sent via Special Delivery for an extra £3.00.

Add this option at checkout.

description:

description:

name: Custom Large Pendant
description:
Have your own large pendant custom designed for you.

This is a statement piece and is very sparkly!

Available on a heart or rectangular pendant in silver or bronze.

Choose any colour crystals and theme you like. The photos are just a few examples of what is possible.

Features a painted centrepiece which can be further customised.

Once you have placed your order, you will be contacted to discuss your requirements; when ordering please ensure your contact details are correct.

Please note, the waiting time for your pendant is 3 weeks, but in many cases, will arrive sooner.

If you would like a different pendant design or have a bespoke project in mind, please get in touch!

name: Custom iPhone 5 Case
description:
Have your own iPhone 5 case custom designed for you.

Choose any colour and theme you like. The photos are just a few examples of what is possible.

The default application of crystals is a graduation of your chosen colour mixed with black at the bottom to clear at the top. The case is kept clear so that the black or white back of your phone shows through and gives the cleanest appearance. If you prefer, however, the crystal colours can be mixed throughout the design or have a base colour painted underneath.

Between 800 to 1000 Swarovski crystals are applied individually around a "Bijou but Deadly" painted resin centrepiece which is also customized - you could have your initials or a silhouette of your own choice painted on, or perhaps a similar design to the jewellery ranges. The centrepiece can be bigger than those shown in the galley.

Once you have placed your order, you will be contacted to discuss your requirements; when ordering please ensure your contact details are correct.

Please note, the waiting time for your case is 3 weeks, but may arrive sooner.

If you have a phone other than an iPhone and would like a custom cover, please get in touch!
